similarities: Both include the names of the owner and tenant
Both mention the rent amount and maintenance costs
Both specify the duration of the agreement
differences: Document 1 is for a property in Pune, while Document 2 is for a property in Mumbai
The owner's name is Mr. Rajesh Sharma in Document 1 and Mr. Ashok Gupta in Document 2
The tenant's name is Ms. Priya Nair in Document 1 and Mr. Rahul Desai in Document 2
The rent is ₹25,000 per month in Document 1 and ₹60,000 per month in Document 2
The maintenance cost is ₹2,000 per month in Document 1 and ₹5,000 per month in Document 2
The security deposit is ₹75,000 in Document 1 and ₹2,00,000 in Document 2
The duration of the agreement is from 01/03/2025 to 31/01/2026 in Document 1 and from 10/01/2025 to 09/12/2025 in Document 2
The witnesses in Document 1 are Mr. Sanjay Kulkarni and Mrs. Ritu Deshmukh, while in Document 2 they are Mr. Rohit Jain and Mrs. Sneha Kapoor
unique_doc1: The owner's father's name is mentioned (Mohan Sharma)
unique_doc2: The tenant's father's name is mentioned (Mahesh Desai)
The tenant is a banker at HDFC Bank
The property address includes 'nepean sea road' and 'baner'
